name: Silly Melee
overview: Silly Melee is a modification to Super Smash Bros. Melee made by two Youtubers, Alpharad and MagicScrumpy. In this mod, all characters are changed to be Sillier than they ever were before. On top of this, new stages were added to the game to broaden the experience. This is a fun mod for all lovers of Smash.
